settings.content:
Frequently Asked Questions

What sizes do you offer?

Most shirts are available in sizes S, M, L, and XL. Check the product page for specific size charts.

How long does shipping take?

Orders are processed in 2–3 business days. Standard NZ shipping takes 3–7 business days after dispatch. See our Shipping Policy for details.

What is your return policy?

We accept return requests within 7 days of delivery. Items must be unworn and in original condition. See our Return Policy for details.

How can I contact customer care?

Use our Contact Us form and we'll respond within 3–5 business days.
